title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2629/84 of 13 September 1984 amending quantitative limits fixed for imports of certain textile products originating in Czechoslovakia, Hungary and Poland
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2629/84
of 13 September 1984
amending quantitative limits fixed for imports of certain textile products originating in Czechoslovakia, Hungary and Poland
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The quantitative limits for textile products originating in Czechoslovakia, Hungary and Poland, as fixed in Annex III to Regulation (EEC) No 3589/82, are hereby amended for 1984 as laid down in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 September 1984.
For the Commission
Wilhelm HAFERKAMP
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 374, 31. 12. 1982, p. 106.
(2) OJ No L 380, 31. 12. 1983, p. 1.
